sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp" name="Agile Development" version="1.0.0" type="application" state="published" help="Scrum_Process_Pack_Plugin" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true"> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.model"/> <import plugin="com.snc.sdlc.scrum"/> <import plugin="com.glideapp.custom_charts"/> <import plugin="com.glide.sorting"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/> </requires> <description>The Agile Development plugin wraps a formal process over the core SDLC-SCRUM offering. If you already have a customized version of SDLC-SCRUM, please refer to the Wiki before activating this plug-in.</description> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="BurnDownTickUnit" class="com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp.BurnDownTickUnit"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CSSVariableResolver" class="com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp.CSSVariableResolver"/> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>The Agile Development plugin wraps a formal process over the core SDLC-SCRUM offering. If you already have a customized version of SDLC-SCRUM, please refer to the Wiki before activating this plug-in.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Scrum_Process_Pack_Plugin</help> <id>com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Agile Development</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.model,com.snc.sdlc.scrum,com.glideapp.custom_charts,com.glide.sorting,com.glide.ui.ng</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
